00059         public function __construct(F3_GimmeFive_Component_Manager $componentManager, F3_MailformPlusPlus_Configuration $configuration) {

00079         protected function clearTempFiles($olderThan) {
00080                 if(!$olderThan) {
00081                         return;
00082                 }
00083 
00084                 //get temp upload folder
00085                 $uploadFolder = $this->getTempUploadFolder();
00086 
00087                 //build absolute path to upload folder
00088                 $path = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getDocumentRoot().$uploadFolder;
00089 
00090                 //read files in directory
00091                 $tmpFiles = t3lib_div::getFilesInDir($path);
00092 
00093                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Cleaning temporary files in folder \"".$path."\"");
00094 
00095                 //calculate threshold timestamp
00096                 //hours * 60 * 60 = millseconds
00097                 $threshold = time() - $olderThan * 60 * 60;
00098 
00099                 //for all files in temp upload folder
00100                 foreach($tmpFiles as $file) {
00101 
00102                         //if creation timestamp is lower than threshold timestamp
00103                         //delete the file
00104                         $creationTime = filemtime($path.$file);
00105 
00106                         //fix for different timezones
00107                         $creationTime += date("O")/100*60;
00108                         if($creationTime < $threshold) {
00109                                 unlink($path.$file);
00110                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Deleted file \"".$file."\"",false);
00111                         }
00112                 }
00113         }
00114 
00129         protected function getTempUploadFolder() {
00130 
00131                 //set default upload folder
00132                 $uploadFolder = '/uploads/mailformplusplus/tmp/';
00133 
00134                 //if temp upload folder set in TypoScript, take that setting
00135                 if($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings']['files.']['tmpUploadFolder']) {
00136                         $uploadFolder = $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings']['files.']['tmpUploadFolder'];
00137                         $uploadFolder = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::sanitizePath($uploadFolder);
00138                 }
00139 
00140                 //if the set directory doesn't exist, print a message
00141                 #if(!is_dir(F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getDocumentRoot().$uploadFolder)) {
00142                 #               F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Folder: '".F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getDocumentRoot().$uploadFolder."' doesn't exist!");
00143                 #       }
00144                 if(!is_dir(F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getTYPO3Root().$uploadFolder)) {
00145                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Folder: '".F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getTYPO3Root().$uploadFolder."' doesn't exist!");
00146                 }
00147                 return $uploadFolder;
00148         }

00165         protected function clearSession() {
00166                 session_start();
00167                 unset($_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues']);
00168                 unset($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles']);
00169                 unset($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['lastStep']);
00170                 unset($_SESSION['submitted_ok']);
00171                 unset($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['usedSuffix']);
00172                 unset($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['usedSettings']);
00173                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Form is called the first time, cleared params in $_SESSION");
00174         }
00175 
00184         protected function processFiles() {
00185                 session_start();
00186 
00187                 //if files were uploaded
00188                 if(isset($_FILES) && is_array($_FILES)) {
00189 
00190                         //get upload folder
00191                         $uploadFolder = $this->getTempUploadFolder();
00192 
00193                         //build absolute path to upload folder
00194                         #$uploadPath = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getDocumentRoot().$uploadFolder;
00195                         $uploadPath = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::getTYPO3Root().$uploadFolder;
00196                         if(!file_exists($uploadPath)) {
00197                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Folder: ".$uploadPath." doesn't exist!");
00198                                 return;
00199                         }
00200                         //for all file properties
00201                         /*
00202                         * $_FILES looks like this:
00203                         *
00204                         * Array (
00205                         *       [mailformplusplus] => Array (
00206                         *               [name] => Array (
00207                         *       [picture] =>
00208                         *       [picture2] => Wasserlilien.jpg
00209                         *       )
00210                         *               [type] => Array (
00211                         *       [picture] =>
00212                         *       [picture2] => image/jpeg
00213                         *       )
00214                         *               [tmp_name] => Array (
00215                         *       [picture] =>
00216                         *       [picture2] => /cluster/ispman/temp/phpbqqUEg
00217                         *       )
00218                         *               [error] => Array (
00219                         *       [picture] => 4
00220                         *       [picture2] => 0
00221                         *       )
00222                         *               [size] => Array (
00223                         *       [picture] => 0
00224                         *       [picture2] => 83794
00225                         *       )
00226                         *        )
00227                         *)
00228                         */
00229                         foreach($_FILES as $sthg=>&$files) {
00230 
00231                                 //if a file was uploaded
00232                                 if(isset($files['name']) && is_array($files['name'])) {
00233 
00234                                         //for all file names
00235                                         foreach($files['name'] as $field=>$name) {
00236                                                 $filename = substr($name, 0, strpos($name, '.'));
00237                                                 if(strlen($filename) > 0) {
00238                                                         $ext = substr($name, strpos($name, '.'));
00239                                                         $suffix = 1;
00240 
00241                                                         //build file name
00242                                                         $uploadedFileName = $filename.$ext;
00243 
00244                                                         //rename if exists
00245                                                         while(file_exists($uploadPath.$uploadedFileName)) {
00246                                                                 $uploadedFileName = $filename."_".$suffix.$ext;
00247                                                                 $suffix++;
00248 
00249                                                         }
00250                                                         $files['name'][$field] = $uploadedFileName;
00251 
00252                                                         //move from temp folder to temp upload folder
00253                                                         #print $files['tmp_name'][$field];
00254                                                         #print $uploadPath.$uploadedFileName;
00255                                                         move_uploaded_file($files['tmp_name'][$field],$uploadPath.$uploadedFileName);
00256                                                         $files['uploaded_name'][$field] = $uploadedFileName;
00257 
00258                                                         //set values for $_SESSION
00259                                                         $tmp['name'] = $name;
00260                                                         $tmp['uploaded_name'] = $uploadedFileName;
00261                                                         $tmp['uploaded_path'] = $uploadPath;
00262                                                         $tmp['size'] = $files['size'][$field];
00263                                                         $tmp['type'] = $files['type'][$field];
00264                                                         if(!is_array($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$field]) && strlen($field)) {
00265                                                                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$field] = array();
00266                                                         }
00267                                                         array_push($_SESSION['mailformplusplusFiles'][$field],$tmp);
00268                                                 }
00269                                         }
00270                                 }
00271                         }
00272                 }
00273 
00274                 session_commit();
00275                 session_start();
00276         }

00285         public function setTemplateFile($template) {
00286                 $this->templateFile = $template;
00287         }

00289         protected function runClasses($classesArray) {
00290                 foreach($classesArray as $tsConfig) {
00291                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Calling: ".$tsConfig['class']);
00292                         $obj = $this->componentManager->getComponent($tsConfig['class']);
00293                         $this->gp = $obj->process($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.']);
00294                 }
00295         }
00296 
00304         public function process() {
00305                 session_start();
00306 
00307                 //read settings
00308                 $settings = $this->getSettings();
00309                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings'] = $settings;
00310 
00311                 //set debug mode
00312                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['debugMode'] = ($settings['debug'] == "1")?TRUE:FALSE;
00313 
00314                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Using controller \"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Controller_Default\"");
00315 
00316                 //set gp vars
00317                 $this->gp = array_merge(t3lib_div::_GET(), t3lib_div::_POST());
00318                 if($settings['formValuesPrefix']) {
00319                         $this->gp = $this->gp[$settings['formValuesPrefix']];
00320                 }
00321 
00322                 //set submitted
00323                 $submitted = $this->gp['submitted'];
00324 
00325                 if($this->gp['step-1']) {
00326                         $submitted = false;
00327                         $submit_reload = true;
00328                         $this->processFiles();
00329                 }
00330 
00331                 //read template file
00332                 $this->readTemplateFile($settings);
00333 
00334                 // set stylesheet file
00335                 $this->setStyleSheet($settings);
00336 
00337                 //add some JavaScript for fancy form stuff
00338                 $this->addSpecialJS($settings);
00339 
00340                 //init view
00341                 if(!$settings['view']) {
00342                         $settings['view'] = "F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Default";
00343                 }
00344                 $viewClass = $settings['view'];
00345                 $view = $this->componentManager->getComponent($viewClass);
00346                 $view->setTemplate($this->templateFile, 'FORM');
00347                 $view->setLangFile($this->langFile);
00348                 $view->setPredefined($this->predefined);
00349 
00350                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Using view \"".$viewClass."\"");
00351                 $errors = array();
00352                 session_start();
00353 
00354                 //if not submitted
00355                 if(!$submitted) {
00356 
00357                         if(!$submit_reload) {
00358                                         
00359                                 //clear session variables
00360                                 $this->clearSession();
00361                         }
00362 
00363                         //clear uploaded files in temp folder if configured
00364                         $this->clearTempFiles($settings['files.']['clearTempFilesOlderThanHours']);
00365 
00366                         unset($_SESSION['submitted_ok']);
00367 
00368                         //run preProcessors
00369                         if(isset($settings['preProcessors.']) && is_array($settings['preProcessors.'])) {
00370                                 $this->runClasses($settings['preProcessors.']);
00371                         }
00372 
00373                         //run init interceptors
00374                         if(isset($settings['initInterceptors.']) && is_array($settings['initInterceptors.'])) {
00375                                 $this->runClasses($settings['initInterceptors.']);
00376                         }
00377 
00378                         //display form
00379                         $content = $view->render($this->gp,$errors).$this->additionalJS;
00380                         return $content;
00381 
00382                         //if submitted
00383                 } else {
00384 
00385                         //run init interceptors
00386                         if(isset($settings['initInterceptors.']) && is_array($settings['initInterceptors.']) && !$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00387                                 $this->runClasses($settings['initInterceptors.']);
00388                         }
00389 
00390                         //run validation
00391                         $valid = array(true);
00392                         if(isset($settings['validators.']) && is_array($settings['validators.'])  && !$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00393                                 foreach($settings['validators.'] as $tsConfig) {
00394                                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Calling Validator: ".$tsConfig['class']);
00395                                         $validator = $this->componentManager->getComponent($tsConfig['class']);
00396 
00397                                         //add requiredFields settings from plugin record, if class is the default validator or a subclass.
00398                                         if((is_a($validator,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Validator_Default") || is_subclass_of($validator,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Validator_Default")) && is_array($this->requiredFields)) {
00399                                                 $tsConfig['config.']['requiredFields'] = $this->requiredFields;
00400                                         }
00401                                         $res = $validator->validate($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.'],$errors);
00402                                         array_push($valid,$res);
00403                                 }
00404                         }
00405 
00406                         //if form is valid
00407                         if($this->isValid($valid)) {
00408                                 if(!$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00409                                         $this->processFiles();
00410                                 }
00411 
00412                                 //run save interceptors
00413                                 if(isset($settings['saveInterceptors.'])  && is_array($settings['saveInterceptors.'])  && !$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00414                                         $this->runClasses($settings['saveInterceptors.']);
00415                                 }
00416 
00417                                 //run loggers
00418                                 if(isset($settings['loggers.']) && is_array($settings['loggers.']) && !$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00419                                         foreach($settings['loggers.'] as $tsConfig) {
00420                                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Calling Logger: ".$tsConfig['class']);
00421                                                 $logger = $this->componentManager->getComponent($tsConfig['class']);
00422                                                 $logger->log($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.']);
00423                                         }
00424                                 }
00425 
00426                                 //run finishers
00427                                 if(isset($settings['finishers.']) && is_array($settings['finishers.'])) {
00428                                         foreach($settings['finishers.'] as $tsConfig) {
00429 
00430                                                 $finisher = $this->componentManager->getComponent($tsConfig['class']);
00431                                                 //check if the form was finished before. This flag is set by the F3_Finisher_Confirmation
00432                                                 if(!$_SESSION['submitted_ok']) {
00433                                                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Calling Finisher: ".$tsConfig['class']);
00434                                                         $tsConfig['config.']['returns'] = $tsConfig['returns'];
00435                                                         $tsConfig['config.']['templateFile'] = $settings['templateFile'];
00436                                                         $tsConfig['config.']['langFile'] = $settings['langFile'];
00437                                                         $tsConfig['config.']['formValuesPrefix'] = $settings['formValuesPrefix'];
00438 
00439                                                         //if the finisher returns HTML (e.g. F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation)
00440                                                         if($tsConfig['config.']['returns']) {
00441 
00442                                                                 return $finisher->process($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.']);
00443                                                         } else {
00444 
00445                                                                 //add email settings from plugin record if the finisher is the mail finisher or a subclass
00446                                                                 if((is_a($finisher,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Mail") || is_subclass_of($finisher,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Mail"))) {
00447                                                                         $finisher->setEmailSettings($this->emailSettings);
00448 
00449                                                                         //add redirect settings from plugin record if the finisher is the recirect finisher or a subclass
00450                                                                 } elseif((is_a($finisher,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Redirect") || is_subclass_of($finisher,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Redirect"))) {
00451                                                                         if(strlen($this->redirectPage) > 0) {
00452                                                                                 $tsConfig['config.']['redirect_page'] = $this->redirectPage;
00453                                                                         }
00454                                                                 }
00455 
00456                                                                 $this->gp = $finisher->process($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.']);
00457                                                         }
00458 
00459                                                         //if the form was finished before, only show the output of the F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation
00460                                                 } elseif((is_a($finisher,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation") || is_subclass_of($finisher,"F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation"))) {
00461                                                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Calling Finisher: ".$tsConfig['class']);
00462                                                         $finisher = $this->componentManager->getComponent($tsConfig['class']);
00463                                                         $tsConfig['config.']['templateFile'] = $settings['templateFile'];
00464                                                         $tsConfig['config.']['langFile'] = $settings['langFile'];
00465                                                         $tsConfig['config.']['formValuesPrefix'] = $settings['formValuesPrefix'];
00466                                                         return $finisher->process($this->gp,$tsConfig['config.']);
00467                                                 }
00468                                         }
00469                                 }
00470 
00471                                 //not returned, but finished. What to do?
00472 
00473                                 //if form is not valid
00474                         } else {
00475 
00476                                 //show form with errors
00477                                 $content = $view->render($this->gp,$errors).$this->additionalJS;
00478                                 return $content;
00479                         }
00480                 }
00481 
00482 
00483         }

00492         protected function setStyleSheet(&$settings) {
00493                 $stylesheetFile = $settings['stylesheetFile'];
00494                 if (strlen($stylesheetFile) > 0) {
00495 
00496                         // set stylesheet
00497                         $GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData['special_css'] .=
00498                                 '<link rel="stylesheet" href="'.F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::resolveRelPathFromSiteRoot($stylesheetFile).'" type="text/css" media="screen" />';
00499                 }
00500         }
00501 
00509         protected function readTemplateFile(&$settings) {
00510 
00511                 //template file was not set in flexform, search TypoScript for setting
00512                 if(!$this->templateFile) {
00513 
00514                         $templateFile = $settings['templateFile'];
00515                         if(isset($settings['templateFile.']) && is_array($settings['templateFile.'])) {
00516                                 $this->templateFile = $this->cObj->cObjGetSingle($settings['templateFile'],$settings['templateFile.']);
00517                         } else {
00518                                 $this->templateFile = t3lib_div::getURL(F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::resolvePath($templateFile));
00519                         }
00520                 } else {
00521                         $templateFile = $this->templateFile;
00522                         $this->templateFile = t3lib_div::getURL(F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::resolvePath($templateFile));
00523                 }
00524 
00525                 if(!$this->templateFile) {
00526                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Could not find template file");
00527                 }
00528 
00529         }

00565         protected function addSpecialJS($settings) {
00566 
00567                 /*
00568                  * do fancy form.
00569                  * Adds JavaScript to replace checkboxes and radio buttons with graphics
00570                  */
00571                 if($settings['fancyForm'] == "1") {
00572                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Using fancy form stuff");
00573                         $GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData['special_css'] .= '
00574                                 <link href="typo3conf/ext/mailformplusplus/Resources/JS/crir/crir.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="screen"/>
00575                         ';
00576                         if(!strstr($GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData['special_js'],"/jquery.js")) {
00577                                 $GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData['special_js'] .=
00578                                 '<script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript" src="'.t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath('mailformplusplus').'Resources/JS/jquery/jquery.js"></script>';
00579                         }
00580                         $GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData['special_js'] .= '
00581                                 <script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript" src="'.t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath('mailformplusplus').'Resources/JS/crir/crir.js"></script>
00582                                 ';
00583                         $parentId = $settings['fancyForm.']['parentId'];
00584                         if($parentId) {
00585                                 $this->additionalJS .= '
00586                                 <script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
00587                                         $("#'.$parentId.' input[@type=checkbox]").addClass("crirHiddenJS");
00588                                         $("#'.$parentId.' input[@type=radio]").addClass("crirHiddenJS");
00589                                 </script>';
00590                         } else {
00591                                 $this->additionalJS .= '
00592                                 <script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
00593                                         $("input[@type=checkbox]").addClass("crirHiddenJS");
00594                                         $("input[@type=radio]").addClass("crirHiddenJS");
00595                                 </script>';
00596                         }
00597                 }
00598 
00599                 /*
00600                  * Adds JavaScript for help texts. This texts will fade in, when the input fields gets focus and fade out on blur.
00601                  */
00602                 if(is_array($settings['helpTexts.'])) {
00603                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Enabling help texts");
00604                         if(!strstr($GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData['special_js'],"/jquery.js")) {
00605                                 $GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData['special_js'] .=
00606                                 '<script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript" src="'.t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath('mailformplusplus').'Resources/JS/jquery/jquery.js"></script>';
00607                         }
00608                         $class = $settings['helpTexts.']['className'];
00609                         $parentId = $settings['helpTexts.']['parentId'];
00610                         $parentTimes = $settings['helpTexts.']['parentTimes'];
00611                         $parent = "";
00612                         if(is_numeric($parentTimes)) {
00613                                 for($i = 0;$i < $parentTimes; $i++) {
00614                                         $parents .= 'parent().';
00615                                 }
00616                         }
00617                         $this->additionalJS .= '
00618                         <script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
00619                                 $("#'.$parentId.' .'.$class.'").hide();
00620                                 $("#'.$parentId.' input[@type=text]").focus(function(){
00621                                         $(this).'.$parents.'next().children(".'.$class.'").fadeIn("slow");
00622                                 });
00623                                 $("#'.$parentId.' input[@type=text]").blur(function(){
00624                                         $(this).'.$parents.'next().children(".'.$class.'").fadeOut("slow");
00625                                 });
00626                         </script>';
00627                 }
00628 
00629                 /*
00630                  * Adds JavaScript for auto complete. If the user types some letters in a configured field, a list of suggestions will be shown.
00631                  */
00632                 if(is_array($settings['autoComplete.'])) {
00633                         F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Enabling autoComplete");
00634 
00635                         $GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData['special_css'] .= '
00636                                 <link href="typo3conf/ext/mailformplusplus/Resources/JS/autocomplete/jquery.autocomplete.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="screen"/>
00637                                 <link href="typo3conf/ext/mailformplusplus/Resources/JS/autocomplete/lib/thickbox.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="screen"/>
00638                         ';
00639                         $GLOBALS['TSFE']->additionalHeaderData['special_js'] .= '
00640                                 <script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript" src="'.t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath('mailformplusplus').'Resources/JS/autocomplete/lib/jquery.bgiframe.min.js"></script>
00641                                 <script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript" src="'.t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath('mailformplusplus').'Resources/JS/autocomplete/lib/jquery.ajaxQueue.js"></script>
00642                                 <script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript" src="'.t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath('mailformplusplus').'Resources/JS/autocomplete/lib/thickbox-compressed.js"></script>
00643                                 <script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript" src="'.t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath('mailformplusplus').'Resources/JS/autocomplete/jquery.autocomplete.js"></script>
00644                                 ';
00645                         $this->additionalJS .= '
00646                                 <script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">';
00647                         foreach($settings['autoComplete.'] as $key=>$options) {
00648                                 $values = t3lib_div::trimExplode(",",$options['values']);
00649                                 $this->additionalJS .= '
00650                                         $(document).ready(function(){
00651                                             var valuesArray = new Array("'.implode('","',$values).'");
00652                                                 $("#'.$options['fieldId'].'").autocomplete(valuesArray,{matchContains: true});
00653                                           });
00654                                 ';
00655                         }
00656                         $this->additionalJS .= '
00657                                 </script>
00658                         ';
00659                 }
00660         }

00669         protected function isValid($valid) {
00670                 foreach($valid as $item) {
00671                         if(!$item) {
00672                                 return false;
00673                         }
00674                 }
00675                 return true;
00676         }

00684         protected function initializeController($value='') {
00685                 $this->piVars = t3lib_div::GParrayMerged($this->configuration->getPrefixedPackageKey());
00686         }
